pages.md:
# Previewing Depth of Field

When **PREVIEW DEPTH OF FIELD** is assigned to a function button, pressing the button displays a !Depth of Field Icon icon and stops aperture down to the selected setting, allowing depth of field to be previewed in the display (ðŸ“– 317).
